Stop Fighting GA4. Start Getting Insights.

Tired of data sampling, confusing reports, and repetitive clicks? Our free browser extension enhances the Google Analytics 4 interface so you can find answers faster.

Add to Chrome — It's Free & 100% Private

Free, Safe, and Built for Privacy

100% Private

We never collect, store, transmit, or have access to your personal or analytics data. Period.

Zero Tracking

The extension contains no ads, cookies, or tracking scripts of its own. Your usage is your business.

Runs Locally

All features and calculations run securely within your browser. Nothing ever leaves your computer.

Get Started in 30 Seconds

1

Add to Chrome

Install the extension from the official Chrome Web Store with one click.

2

Open GA4

Navigate to your Google Analytics 4 property. The features are automatically enabled.

3

Get Insights

Enjoy a smarter, faster GA4 interface and start uncovering valuable insights.

Solve GA4's Biggest Annoyances

A/B Test Analysis

Instantly see statistical significance and sample ratio mismatch (SRM) inside your Exploration reports.

Data Range Presets

Save time with one-click buttons for common date ranges like "Last 7 Days" or "Month-over-Month."

% Change Highlighter

Use conditional formatting to instantly spot significant positive or negative trends in your reports.
